items.sentence: Let\'s make sure we\'re doing what we\'re supposed to be doing.
It\'s not a secret that Tom\'s opinion is different than yours.
I can\'t tell you how happy I am that you\'ve come to visit us.
I can\'t tell you how much I\'ve looked forward to this moment.
The doctor told Tom that he had to wear a cast for three weeks.
The old lady was kind enough to show me the way to the station.
The pain was more than he could bear, so he took some medicine.
The police found a dead body in an abandoned car near the park.
You don\'t really believe that Tom did that on purpose, do you?
You shouldn\'t say that kind of thing when children are around.
Do you know whether or not Tom is going to sing for us tonight?
Go straight down this street and turn right at the third light.
You need to take responsibility for everything that went wrong.
Wouldn\'t you rather spend your time doing something you enjoy?
A lot of bicycles are illegally parked in front of the station.
I thought we weren\'t supposed to tell Tom about what happened.
I\'d like to point out some problems regarding your suggestion.
I\'ve always been a little jealous of your friendship with Tom.
Tom is the only one who would know the answer to that question.
Tom lay awake for a long time thinking about what he should do.
